name: JEsec
short_description:
Java programmers can take advantage from many features offered by the language itself as from that created by the open source comunity; but integration with other languages may be painfull, expecially from OS/lang like AS400/RPG.
JEsec want to be a collection of encapsultated java/oos features directly java-callable or proxied by JEsec tcp-ip service or by JEsec client caller.
summary: Incapsulate Java/oos features for easy usage from AS400 or other lang
